ARABIC: صُمٌّۢ بُكْمٌ عُمْىٌ فَهُمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Deaf, dumb, blind. They will not return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They are deaf, dumb and blind, and shall never return;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They are deaf; they are dumb; they are blind so they will not return (to the right way).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They are deaf, blind, and dumb and cannot regain their senses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Deaf, dumb and blind; and they are not to return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They are deaf, dumb, and blind, so they return not (to the right path).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Deaf, dumb (and) blind, so they will not turn back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: deaf, dumb, blind -- so they shall not return;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Deaf, dumb and blind; and they return not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: deaf, dumb, and blind: they will never return [to the right path].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Deaf, dumb, blind; wherefore they will not return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Deaf, dumb, and blind, they will not come back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Deaf, dumb, and blind, they will not return (to the path).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They are deaf, dumb, and blind, so they return not (to the Right Path).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Deaf, dumb, and blind, they shall never return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Deaf, dumb, blind. They will not return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Deaf, dumb and blind - so they will not return [to the right path].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:18] deaf, to the truth, so that they cannot hear it and accept it; dumb, mute as regards goodness, unable to speak of it; and, blind, to the path of guidance, so that they cannot perceive it; they shall not return, from error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Deaf) pretending to be deaf, (dumb) pretending to be dumb, (and blind) pretending to be blind; (so they return not) from their disbelief and error.
